title.en: A Short Prayer to Tutop Lingpa1

text.en: O Heruka, you are the heroic Lord of Secrets2appearing in person.
Through the supreme accomplishment of Vajrakīlaya, you found absolute confidence in the enlightened perspective.
text.en-trans: purpa chok drub gongpé dengtsé nyé

text.en: O, lord of profound treasures who is cared for by Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: pemé jezung zabmo ter gyi dak

text.en: Tutop Lingpa, please grace the stream of my being!
text.en-trans: tutob lingpé dak gyü jingyi lob
